extensionDescription.message: Basic Calculator is a simple calculator extension for your browser

faqQuestion1.description: The first question of the FAQ

faqAnswer1.message:
You can use the following shortcuts: 
 - Enter: Calculate the result 
 - C: Clear the input 
 - Backspace: Delete the last character 
 - Numbers 0-9: Enter the number 
 - Operators +, -, *, /: Enter the operator 
 - '.' or ',': Enter the decimal point
faqAnswer1.description: The answer of the first question of the FAQ
